title: Shipping giant Maersk to add SpaceX’s Starlink internet to over 330 ships by early next year
summary: Danish logistics giant Maersk is adding SpaceX’s Starlink to more than 330 container ships, the companies announced on Thursday.

title: Investing in Space: A reality check on SPAC frenzy revenue projections
summary: We’re now at least two years on from when a slew of space companies went public during the SPAC frenzy, and, look, none of them look great.

title: Startup GuardianSat gets research grant for satellite self-defense technology
summary: GuardianSat won a grant from the National Science Foundation’s America’s Seed Fund to advance the company’s technology designed to protect satellites from collisions with debris objects in space.

title: Commercial Interruption: Space wargame exposes risk of dangerous escalation

title: SpaceX Starlink lands Maersk in new deal for Ocean fleet
